title.narrative: Local Government Finance and Fiscal Decentralization Reform Program, Subprogram 2

description.narrative: The program supports the government's commitment to improve service delivery by local government units (LGUs) and represents a long-term partnership between the Asian Development Bank (ADB) and the government. The government's priorities to improve local service delivery include (i) enhancing LGU access to own-revenue sources, (ii) strengthening public financial management systems, (iii) improving the transparency and accountability of LGUs, and (iv) improving the regulatory framework for intergovernmental fiscal relations.

participating-org.narrative: Department of Interior and Local Government
